**TILE
***
*DESCRIPTION: This is a wall
*PASSABLE: false
***
*DESCRIPTION: This is the floor
*PASSABLE: true
***

**OBJECT
***
*PASSABLE: false
*DESCRIPTION: this is an object
*FACE: up
***

**ACTOR
***
*DESCRIPTION: this is an actor
*START_X: 5 
*START_Y: 5
*FACE: up
*BITMAP: sprite_1.png
*SPEED: 10
***

***
*FACE: up
*START_X: 5
*START_Y: 5
*BITMAP: sprite_1.png
*DESCRIPTION: this is a player
*SPEED: 10
